entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
